review: Hooks directly into the hdmi port on the screen and you can connect the USB power supply to either the wall socket or the USB port on your tv. It turns the chromecast on/off when you turn your tv on/off which is really streamlined and requires less steps to go from zero to streaming he internet onto my big screen tv.HBOGO is my most used app and it streams to my tv's maximum potential in terms of clarity and smoothness. I can control the app from my ipad mini which acts as a remote.  If you have a pc or laptop you can stream any tab from the chrome browser directly to the tv.  Right now iOS is restricted to a dozen or so apps including Netflix and YouTube.It's honestly a great product.. One I'm excited about enough to actually compose this product review. Quick setup, efficient and easy use for a slick upgrade to any entertainment system.
author: "Gob Bluth"

review: This is a great product that gets better every update. I highly recommend this,  it's great for Netflix, YouTube and anything you can view in your chrome browser.  I stream movies all day. Make sure you have a good wifi router.One other note,  with devices like this it's easy to stop watching network tv. I didn't watch network tv for over a month.  Next step is building he entertainment pc and cutting off the cable tv.

review: Think of it: a device not much bigger than a USB memory stick that plugs into your TV, connects to your wireless network, and allows you to use virtually any other device on your wireless network as its remote control.Stunning.

review: What junk!  Everything says you can stream your desktop and browser to your TV.  No it does not allow you to do this!  It may have used to allow this to be done, but the current version is nothing more than another big brother controlled streaming player.  I guess if I really want to hook up my PC to my TV, I'll be running some long HDMI lines.  You have been warned!!!
